Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.16.1 Spatial Function Reference
Description:
Construct Polygon from LineString arguments

Polygon(ls [,
          ls] ...)

          Constructs a Polygon value from a number of
          LineString or WKB
          LineString arguments. If any argument does
          not represent a LinearRing (that is, not a
          closed and simple LineString), the return
          value is NULL.
